meanings.definition: The state of being exultant or joyful.
meanings.sent1: Her exultancy was evident in her wide smile and cheerful demeanor.
meanings.sent2: The exultancy on his face showed how happy he was with his accomplishment.
meanings.sent3: The exultancy of the puppy as it chased its tail was truly heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The exultancy in the air after the team's victory was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The exultancy of the children playing in the park was contagious.

meanings.definition: A feeling of great happiness or triumph.
meanings.sent1: The exultancy in the room was infectious, spreading from person to person.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't contain her exultancy when she received the good news.
meanings.sent3: The exultancy of winning the game made him jump for joy.
meanings.sent4: The exultancy of the crowd echoed through the stadium after the final goal.
meanings.sent5: His exultancy at the surprise party was a moment he would never forget.
